bug.author: calvinjia
bug.summary: Query parameters are propagated incorrectly in the web ui
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 2.0.0 Describe the bug When pressing the Go button on the browse page, it keeps all query parameters including offset and limit. This causes problems when browsing a large directory and going to a smaller directory. To Reproduce Create a folder with > 20 files (to activate pagination). Go to the second page. Press Go to return to the root (< 20 files) Expected behavior User is brought to the appropriate first paginated page of the destination.
